title: It’s not Bastille Day, it’s ‘Ineos Day’: Kwiatkowski provides the fireworks
content:
Podium push for Rodríguez and surging Pidcock as old and young Ineos Grenadiers riders feed off one another's energy.

Read the full article at It’s not Bastille Day, it’s ‘Ineos Day’: Kwiatkowski provides the fireworks on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
